entry.title: Where we Belong
entry.summary:
Author: AestheticWrites

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,325Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Buck and Eddie had a rough start to their friendship. They argued and couldn’t stand being in the same room. But through the chaos, they became something stronger: best friends who could rely on each other no matter what. Buck knows who he is—bi, passionate, and mostly unafraid; but when it comes to Eddie, everything feels dangerously different. Eddie is straight, devoted to his eight-year-old son Chris, and oblivious to the feelings quietly growing in Buck’s heart. Buck doesn’t even realize he’s falling, but the pull between them is undeniable. Then life shatters their carefully built world. Shannon, Eddie’s partner and Chris’s mother, dies unexpectedly. And at her funeral, a girl appears, a sixteen-year-old stranger with the same eyes as Shannon, claiming to be Shannon’s daughter, and in turn, apparently Eddie’s daughter, a secret Shannon kept. A secret he never knew existed. Now, Buck and Eddie are navigating grief, family secrets, and the fragile threads of a relationship neither thought they’d have.

entry.title: Hazel Brown and Royal Blue
entry.summary:
Author: PenInBlues

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,533Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 6

Summary: In a world where politics and royalty collide, Evan “Buck” Buckley is the Second Prince of England—the spare with just enough responsibility to behave and just enough freedom to be dangerous. Charismatic, reckless, and hiding more than the tabloids will ever know, Buck lives his life like the crown is a game he never asked to play. Across the ocean, Edmundo “Eddie” Diaz has spent his entire life following orders—first as a soldier like his father, and now as the First Son of the United States after his mother’s unexpected rise to the presidency. Returning from the army with a son to protect, Eddie is determined to build a controlled, quiet life far away from chaos. That plan shatters the moment Eddie sees the Second Prince of England again—blue-eyed, infuriating, and impossible to ignore. They must decide whether protecting their worlds is worth losing each other—or if love itself is the biggest risk they’ll ever take.

entry.title: bleed it out
entry.summary:
Author: popcorn_squirrel

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,171Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 46

Summary: Eddie thought wearing a bulletproof vest would protect him. It’s designed to cover his chest, to prevent any real damage from happening to him. It completely shelters his heart, so no bullet can penetrate such a vital organ and shatter it into pieces.  At least, it’s supposed to. It doesn’t. A sharp crack, a violent whizzing sound, and suddenly Eddie’s ears are ringing. Time seems to slow down around him as he staggers backwards, almost as if he’s been shoved back by an unseen force. or; The 118 respond to the hostage situation at the grocery store, but this time someone gets hurt.

entry.title: A Drop In The Ocean, A Change In The Weather...
entry.summary:
Author: InterrogateTheCat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,915Chapters: 20/20Kudos: 206

Summary: Buck and Eddie are secretly together.Buck and Chris get caught in the tsunami.Buck saves Chris, but doesn't save herself, and is taken out to sea.Stuck on an island alone, pregnant she has to try to survive for her and her baby.Eddie has to mourn his only love.No major death, presumed dead.Alternating POV Or, "The water," Christopher cried, his voice pitching up into hysteria. "She fell off the ambulance! I tried to grab her, Dad, I tried! But she yelled at me to stay! She yelled at me and then the water took her!" Eddie stared at his son. He felt like he had been hollowed out with a spoon. The water took her. "Did she... did you see her get up?" Eddie asked, gripping the chair arm a little too tight. "Did she swim to to safety?" "No," Christopher wailed. "She didn't come back to me! She didn't come back! I couldn't see her." No. No, absolutely not. She is Evi Buckley. She survived a ladder truck bombing. She survived a tracheotomy. She survived a pulmonary embolism. She does not die in a wave. "Dad?" Christopher was looking at him, terrified. "Is Bucky dead?"

entry.title: love, at the worst
entry.summary:
Author: greyspilot

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,606Chapters: 1/12Kudos: 11

Summary: When Eddie came back to L.A. from Texas, Buck knew he would have to move out of Eddie's house, eventually. That had always been the plan; it was always going to be temporary, but Eddie didn't ask, so Buck didn't offer. One night, after a particularly long shift when they were both half-dead on their feet, they collapsed onto the bed together. All they did that night was sleep, but it continued every night after. They didn't talk about it, and Buck thinks that should've been his first warning sign.Or: the Wishbone fic

entry.title: you called me home
entry.summary:
Author: thequeenofwhump

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 96,071Chapters: 11/14Kudos: 508

Summary: Running to the frontlines from a childhood he never had. Taking a bat to the wall with his son in the next room. Having an affair with the spitting image of his dead wife. Eddie knows he’s never been good at grieving, knows he’s never been good at losing what little he allows for himself in the first place. This is why he also knows his coping mechanisms can’t possibly get any worse. Buck, as he so often does, makes him reevaluate his assumptions.—Evan Buckley dies behind a wall of glass. It’s a shame that when he’s revived not three minutes later, no one is informed.

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,541Chapters: 8/14Kudos: 33

Summary: It’s been about 5 months since she had talked to Lena. It’s been seven months since the covid outbreak. A lot has certainly changed. She's been managing being Superwoman while having three new house guests and she swears Krypto is getting fatter. If you ask kara she'll blame Chimney for feeding him scraps. Most importantly, Maddie's almost done with her pregnancy. TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: And If Only I Could Hold You
entry.summary:
Author: Piranahaha

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,479Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 123

Summary: Set in an alternate universe where everyone has a biological imperative to be a dominant, submissive, or switch and where the tsunami happened after the lawsuit.The sub stirs, lifting his head from the tile to blink hazy blue eyes at the person standing in his bathroom. Eddie’s tongue sticks, throat closing at the sight of the gashed open skin on the left side of his face and the bruises darkening his jaw. Buck looks awful. He’s pale and there’s a sheen to his skin. He can’t seem to focus well, squinting up at Eddie in a way that suggests he can’t quite tell who he’s looking at.“Buck.”On the floor, the blond jerks, flinching away from Eddie’s hushed voice. He presses into the wall at his back, his next breaths hitching and catching in his chest. He won’t look at Eddie, ducking away from eye contact. “Please,” he whimpers. “Please. I’m sorry. I’m sorry!” His voice is rising, turning frantic. He’s gasping, tears welling to spill down his cheeks. “I’m sorry!” he cries.Or, Eddie goes to Buck’s to check on the submissive after the tsunami. He’s not okay. Eddie takes care of him. This doesn’t fix things but it’s a start.

entry.title: And I saw scars upon a broken-hearted lover.
entry.summary:
Author: Dontsaymaggot

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,531Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 47

Summary: “So, all of this comes from Ravi putting the idea in your head that Buck might want to kiss you.” Eddie blinked repeatedly under the attentive gaze of his therapist. “No, at that moment I still hadn’t decided to call you to schedule an emergency session,” Eddie shook his head, “but I was starting to believe I would end up needing one after the shift.” or; the fic where Eddie schedules an emergency session with his therapist because he believes things that aren't true just because he doesn't know how to communicate with his best friend (who doesn't know everything about him).

entry.title: Drifting Snow Shaking Ground
entry.summary:
Author: kimurasato

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 104,247Chapters: 42/?Kudos: 404

Summary: Ever since they flew into the heart of a hurricane to search for the cruise ship lost at sea, which happened to be the one their captain and his wife were on, Buck has had own storm of jealousy brewing inside him. Between a girlfriend and a new best friend, Eddie never seems to have any time for him anymore. Is he being selfish wanting Eddie to pay attention to him? Bouncing around him like an overeager puppy screaming look at me, look at me? Maybe. He knows his abandonment issues can turn pretty ugly. But maybe he can get somewhat of a handle on things with a bit of self-reflection, and maybe learn a few new things about himself.On top of everything, someone might be trying to kill him.

entry.title: Chains are meant to break
entry.summary:
Author: Thehouseknight

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,329Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 70

Summary: “Where is your plus one?” Helena asked, looking around. “Buck,” Eddie replied. “Buck?” “Yes,” Buck said. “I’m Eddie’s plus one.” Buck's fingers intertwined with Eddie’s fingers, and he looked at her with a tense gaze. “I’m Eddie’s boyfriend.”--------Or: Eddie and Buck travel to El Paso for Abuela's birthday celebration. But how will the Diaz parents react when Eddie tells them that he's gay and his boyfriend is Buck?
